channel.title: Help with including Include files w/PHP
channel.description:
OK, so I tried to include a .inc file in PHP.
It has like, the database info and stuff like that.
But when I included it, the text would show up on my php file.
Help?

item.title: Help with including Include files w/PHP
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

I know that

I just did it all through PHP

Read full topic
item.source: Help with including Include files w/PHP

item.title: Help with including Include files w/PHP
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“Kollidierende, post:3, topic:177016”]Oh,
I just thought that you could have like stufff that wouldn’t show up in there

So should my database information just be included with SQL files?
Or should I just have them in my PHP script?[/quote]
u cant just include the sql file
u have to run mysql

u could do $file = file_get_contents()

Read full topic
item.source: Help with including Include files w/PHP

item.title: Help with including Include files w/PHP

item.description:

I just thought that you could have like stufff that wouldn’t show up in there

So should my database information just be included with SQL files?

item.title: Help with including Include files w/PHP
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

well duh…
including just adds the file’s contents into the php file (so it basically echos everything not php)

Read full topic
